name: In Corpore Sano
description:
Horror in a sanatorium. Rescue your kid before it's too late, and explore the dark place to uncover the mystery.

You can play with Keyboard, keyboard and mouse or gamepad. The darkness will raise your fear level, you can lower it by finding a light source. To open door, talk to kids, read books : press action ( enter on keyboard)

Made by :

Estelle Van de Velde : Game design, storytelling, level design

Quentin Leonetti : Pixel art, level design

Dominique Pino : Development, sound design, game design

Font : Adventurer by Brian J Smith

Thanks for playing !
